author: mor
msg: Added the ability to change the order to a gift if the user does not selected Gift option during checkout. User have to click on Add link and this will open a text area to
enter the gift message, on saving this text the order will become a gift order.

author: apatel
msg: Making postal address fields options. Map processor in service checks required fields and returns error if appropriate. In case shipping contact mach should be used for billing then we don't need postal address fields data.

author: rr
msg: ODE-639: Memory leak in InMem DAO fix
